meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or shaped like a trapezoid.
meanings.sent1: The building had a trapezoidal roof that sloped down on one side.
meanings.sent2: The trapezoidal table fit perfectly in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The trapezoidal shadow cast by the tree looked like a giant arrow pointing west.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was trapezoidal, stretching wider on one side than the other.
meanings.sent5: The trapezoidal pattern of the carpet made the room feel more spacious.

meanings.definition: Having the shape of a trapezoid.
meanings.sent1: The trapezoidal garden bed was perfect for planting different flowers.
meanings.sent2: The trapezoidal window added a unique touch to the modern house design.
meanings.sent3: The trapezoidal slice of cake made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: His trapezoidal haircut was definitely a bold choice.
meanings.sent5: The trapezoidal pattern on her dress caught everyone's attention at the event.
